==Useful Info==
'''Foxfires''' are magical entities created by casting the spell [[Foxfire]]. They will home in on monsters, dealing damage and destroying themselves in the process.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Foxfires are fleeting 'monsters'. Upon collision, or after 8 turns, they will dissipate harmlessly.
*Because foxfires technically count as creatures, this spell can help block line of effect to monsters with dangerous spells like [[Banishment]], [[Petrify]], or [[Malmutate]]. However, this is not as effective as simply [[summon]]ing a meat shield, as foxfires move quickly and erratically and disappear once they strike something.

==History==
Foxfires were added in [[0.25]].
